name: GMX made simpler
description: GMX is a German based webmail service that is popular among both German and English speakers. After acquiring the French email provider Caramail, they have welcomed many French users as well. Unfortunately, the design of the website has since deteriorated to the point where using it is an almost insufferable experience. Install this simple stylesheet and you can enjoy reading your email once more!
additional_info: A few minimalistic style adjustments have eliminated their obnoxious colour scheme by converting the entire website into a much calmer greyscale and replaced their awful font selection with the more pleasant 'Roboto' web typeface provided by Google Fonts. If you have any suggestions for additional changes, please feel free to contact me. I plan to continue to maintain this stylesheet indefinitely. RELEASE HISTORY Version 1.0: Original Release (23 Apr 2016) CONTACT INFORMATION Credits: Sophia Michelle Andren Contact: www.razorbelle.com
